title: BRIEF-Fortuna Reports Production Of 1.9 Million Ounces Of Silver, 11,436 Ounces Of Gold For Third Quarter Of 2019
text:
BRIEF-Fortuna Reports Production Of 1.9 Million Ounces Of Silver, 11,436 Ounces Of Gold For Third Quarter Of 2019

Stock Markets 4 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 05:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Fortuna Reports Production Of 1.9 Million Ounces Of Silver, 11,436 Ounces Of Gold For Third Quarter Of 2019 Oct 15 (Reuters) - Fortuna Silver Mines Inc : * FORTUNA REPORTS PRODUCTION OF 1.9 MILLION OUNCES OF SILVER AND 11,436 OUNCES OF GOLD FOR THE THIRD QUARTER OF 2019 * Q3 LEAD PRODUCTION OF 7,157,229 POUNDS; 6 PERCENT DECREASE OVER Q3 2018 * Q3 ZINC PRODUCTION OF 11,517,861 POUNDS; 0.3 PERCENT INCREASE OVER Q3 2018

BRIEF-Fortuna Reports Production Of 1.9 Million Ounces Of Silver, 11,436 Ounces Of Gold For Third Quarter Of 2019
